features.title: Realistic Monster Truck Physics
features.description: Experience authentic **monster truck** movement and handling with our advanced physics engine, simulating every jump and crash.

features.title: Multiple Offroad Modes
features.description: Choose from various game modes including **Freestyle Destruction**, **Circuit Race**, and **Offroad Challenge**.

features.title: Extensive Truck Garage
features.description: Unlock and upgrade over 50 unique **monster trucks** and **offroad vehicles** from various manufacturers.

features.title: Dynamic Weather System
features.description: Race through changing weather conditions that affect traction and visibility on the **offroad** terrain.

features.title: Stunt and Race Events
features.description: Coordinate with your fellow drivers for team-based **stunt challenges** or go head-to-head in competitive **races**.

features.title: Progressive Customization
features.description: Customize your **trucks** with unique paint jobs, decals, engine upgrades, and suspension modifications.
